argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( A e. ZZ -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_negidd | |- ( A e. ZZ -> ( A + -u A ) = 0 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zringgrp | |- ZZring e. Grp |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. ZZ -> ZZring e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( A e. ZZ -> A e. ZZ ) |
| 6 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( A e. ZZ -> -u A e. ZZ ) |
| 7 |  | #P_zringbas | |- ZZ = ( Base ` ZZring ) |
| 8 |  | #P_zringplusg | |- + = ( +g ` ZZring ) |
| 9 |  | #P_zring0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` ZZring ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` ZZring ) = ( invg ` ZZring ) |
| 11 | 7, 8, 9, 10 | #P_grpinvid1 | |- ( ( ZZring e. Grp /\ A e. ZZ /\ -u A e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( invg ` ZZring ) ` A ) = -u A <-> ( A + -u A ) = 0 ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 5, 6, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( A e. ZZ -> ( ( ( invg ` ZZring ) ` A ) = -u A <-> ( A + -u A ) = 0 ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_mpbird | |- ( A e. ZZ -> ( ( invg ` ZZring ) ` A ) = -u A ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( A e. ZZ -> -u A = ( ( invg ` ZZring ) ` A ) ) |
